entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He is mentioned as having met Mr. Ollivander before and buying his wand from him in Diagon Alley.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: Mr. Ollivander is a wizard who is the wand-maker. He is mentioned as having sold Harry his wand three years ago.

entities.name: fleur delacour
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is a person who is being examined by Mr. Ollivander. She hands over her wand to him for examination.

entities.name: diagon alley
entities.description: Diagon Alley is a location where Harry bought his wand from Mr. Ollivander three years ago.

entities.name: mademoiselle delacour
entities.description: Mademoiselle Delacour is the title given to Fleur Delacour by Mr. Ollivander.

entities.name: ze'sead of a veela
entities.description: Ze'sead of a Veela is an air that is contained in Fleur's wand.

relationships.description: Mr. Ollivander and Harry have met before, as mentioned in the text.
Fleur Delacour is being examined by Mr. Ollivander.
Harry bought his wand from Diagon Alley three years ago.
Mr. Ollivander is examining Fleur Delacour's wand.
Ze'sead of a Veela is contained in Fleur's wand.
